trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*> method, which allows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> data to be custom filtered.
trans-unit.target: Visar den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>metoden som gör att <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> data ska vara anpassade filtrerade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The IDataPointFilter interface exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method, which takes a specific data point within a series and returns a `Boolean` value that determines whether that data point will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: IDataPointFilter gränssnittet exponerar den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>metod som använder en specifik datapunkt inom en serie och returnerar ett `Boolean` värde som avgör om den datapunkten filtreras.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform custom filtering: - Derive a new or existing class from this interface.
trans-unit.target: Att utföra anpassad filtrering:-härledd en ny eller befintlig klass från det här gränssnittet.

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method to provide the custom filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: -Åsidosätt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>metod för att ange anpassad filtrering logiken.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To initiate the filtering operation, call one of the `Filter` methods in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an IDataPointFilter object as its first parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill initiera filtreringen anropa en av de `Filter` metoder i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>klass som tar ett IDataPointFilter objekt som den första parametern.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: For sample source code, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method.
Determines whether a particular data point in the series will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Anger om en viss datapunkten i serien filtreras.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called for each data point in a series, and returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether a data point should be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden ska anropas för varje datapunkt i en serie och returnerar ett `Boolean` värde som anger om en datapunkt ska filtreras.

trans-unit.source: To provide custom filtering, derive a new or existing class from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> interface and then implement this method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange anpassade filtrering att härleda en ny eller befintlig klass från den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>gränssnitt och sedan implementera den här metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>

trans-unit.source: Provide custom criteria matching logic, then return `true` or `false` to mark the data points to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Ange anpassade villkor matchar logik och sedan returnera `true` eller `false` Markera datapunkter som ska filtreras.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been implemented, use one of the `Filter` method definitions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> object as a parameter to perform the filtering.
trans-unit.target: När den här metoden har implementerats med någon av de `Filter` metoddefinitioner i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>klass som tar en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>-objektet som en parameter för att utföra filtreringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points, by default, are removed from a series.
trans-unit.target: Filtrerade bort, som standard från en serie.

trans-unit.source: They can also be displayed as empty points by setting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: De kan också visas som tom punkter genom att ange värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points can also be marked as filtered if they do not match filtering criteria, as determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>value.
trans-unit.target: Filtrerade punkter kan också markeras som filtrerats om de inte matchar filtreringskriterier som bestäms av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>värde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> objekt som datapunkten som tillhör.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data point, which determines its position in the series.
trans-unit.target: Indexet för den datapunkt som bestämmer positionen i serien.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the data point is removed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Om datapunkten som tas bort, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
